title: CSS Menu Generator - Swimbi(Mac 1.7.0)
description:
SWIMBI (Swift Menu Builder)

Web design app that makes creating advanced navigation menus very easy.

Advanced means, eye-catching design, icons, fonts, shadows, animation effects, etc. 


Intuitive user interface with drag and drop.
Imports your website links in seconds.

A bunch of skins and controls to tweak them.
+ Bonus menu configs

Easily creates drop down CSS menus or vertical flyout menus,
and even both simultaneously.

Update all pages of your website in a single click.


Responsive menus compatible with touch screen devices.
FTP connection to update menu right on your server.

No need of programming nor CSS knowledge.

Good looking menu designs, a lot of options for customizations,
friendly drag-n-drop interface, 500+ icons, patters, effects,
animations, any colors, sizes, etc....


What's new:
- Import link and config instantly.
- Drag and drop importing and loading.
- Sitewide menu update with a single click.
- Simple template engine for static websites
- Even more icons for your navigation menu, 520+
- Improved source code editor (if you want to edit a code)
- New file menu options: Save As and Clone Page

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/swimbi-css-menu-maker/oifipbbfaomegkfhpdbopinkndcdmaop</a>

Using Drop Down Menus for websites is a common and effective way to logically present your site links to website visitors.

Cross-browser compatibility 
Minimal code 
Easy to install
Perfect menu designs
Very flexible
Can be applied to any type of website
